[00:00.00]Paradise (Explicit) - Bazzi
[00:04.41]One two three four
[00:08.04]Hands on your body I'm grabbing your ass
[00:09.82]Enjoying the moment 'cause life move too fast
[00:11.76]I'm looking forward ignoring the past
[00:13.82]These are the times that we'll laugh looking back
[00:15.78]I'm getting lucky like coins in the well
[00:17.73]Goodbye to my haters I'm wishing you well
[00:19.69]This is my year man if you couldn't tell
[00:21.69]This is our life and we're living it well
[00:25.81]Late nights in the city causing hell
[00:29.41]Burn this b***h into the ground oh well
[00:33.57]If all we got tonight let's do this right
[00:36.25]Let's do this right
[00:37.53]Let's go to paradise
[00:41.50]This s**t be like Friday nights
[00:45.17]This s**t make me feel alive
[00:49.20]I feel like we in paradise paradise paradise
[00:57.02]Don't know if it's the drink I poured
[01:00.72]But I swear I've never loved you more
[01:04.66]With you right here I come alive
[01:06.88]One more hit and we can fly
[01:09.13]This shit feel like paradise
[01:11.47]I'm feeling it my head's where the ceiling is oh yeah
[01:15.47]This energy turns nights into memories oh yeah
[01:18.93]Count up the bands you've been working all summer
[01:20.69]Ex didn't know what he had what a bummer
[01:22.78]Insecure people turn to insecure lovers
[01:24.39]Well my drink is almost out and I'm about to pour another
[01:26.24]Just let it out
[01:28.31]The night has just begun we on a level now
[01:32.27]If I get too f**ked up promise you'll hold me down
[01:36.27]Yeah this that s**t you can't deny
[01:38.75]This that s**t you feel inside
[01:40.57]This our life our time we living well
[01:44.19]Late nights in the city causing hell
[01:48.18]Burn this b***h into the ground oh well
[01:52.10]If all we got tonight let's do this right
[01:54.89]Let's do this right
[01:56.39]Let's go to paradise
[02:00.05]This s**t be like Friday nights it do it do
[02:04.02]This s**t make me feel alive yeah
[02:07.82]I feel like we in paradise paradise paradise oh yeah
[02:15.71]Don't know if it's the drink I poured poured
[02:19.66]But I swear I've never loved you more loved you more
[02:23.34]With you right here I come alive
[02:25.62]One more hit and we can fly
[02:27.49]This s**t feel like paradise
data.trans:
[ti:Paradise (Explicit)]
[ar:Bazzi]
[al:Paradise (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.41]一 二 三 四
[00:08.04]尽情舞动起来 跟着我的节奏
[00:09.82]享受这一刻吧 时间过得飞快
[00:11.76]现在只想逃避过去
[00:13.82]不过早晚有一天我们会笑着回忆
[00:15.78]我如此幸运 像许愿池里的硬币一样
[00:17.73]再见吧讨厌的人 我祝你安好
[00:19.69]这是属于我的时刻 你还不明白吗
[00:21.69]这是属于我们的生活 我们生活的很幸福
[00:25.81]城市的夜晚 像无法无天的地狱 
[00:29.41]为所欲为的释放欲望 哦 
[00:33.57]如果我们只剩今晚 我们就疯狂到底吧 
[00:36.25]我们就疯狂到底吧
[00:37.53]我们享受天堂般的快乐
[00:41.50]这嗨的像是星期五晚上
[00:45.17]这嗨的让我感受到自己还活着
[00:49.20]我感觉我们好像正在天堂里放纵
[00:57.02]不知道是不是酒精的作用
[01:00.72]但我发誓我爱你爱到疯狂
[01:04.66]有你在身边 我才是真的活着
[01:06.88]再来一杯 这飞一般的感觉
[01:09.13]这嗨的像是在天堂
[01:11.47]我晕眩的好像脚踩着棉花 头顶着天花板
[01:15.47]这美妙的夜晚 令人难忘
[01:18.93]数一数这整个夏天你工作过的乐队
[01:20.69]他们不懂得欣赏你的才华 多么令人遗憾
[01:22.78]没有安全感的恋人们互相取暖
[01:24.39]我的酒杯马上空了 还要再来一杯
[01:26.24]放空一切
[01:28.31]这精彩的夜晚才刚刚开始 我们享受到一样的欢愉
[01:32.27]如果我做了太丢人的事 拜托你一定要拦住我
[01:36.27]你不能否认可能出现这种情况
[01:38.75]你心里也是这么想的
[01:40.57]这就是我们的生活 我们的美妙时光 我们过得很幸福
[01:44.19]城市的夜晚 像无法无天的地狱
[01:48.18]为所欲为的释放欲望 哦 
[01:52.10]如果我们只剩今晚 我们就疯狂到底吧
[01:54.89]我们就疯狂到底吧
[01:56.39]我们享受天堂般的快乐
[02:00.05]这嗨的像是星期五晚上 确实是 
[02:04.02]这嗨的让我感受到自己还活着
[02:07.82]我感觉我们好像正在天堂里放纵
[02:15.71]不知道是不是酒精的作用
[02:19.66]但我发誓我爱你爱到疯狂
[02:23.34]有你在身边 我才是真的活着
[02:25.62]再来一杯 这飞一般的感觉
[02:27.49]这嗨的像是在天堂
